tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE RainfallData (
  region_id INT,
  date DATE,
  rainfall_amount DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE rainfall_data (
 data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 region_id INT NOT NULL,
 time_period_id INT NOT NULL,
 rainfall_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
 FOREIGN KEY (region_id) REFERENCES region(region_id),
 FOREIGN KEY (time_period_id) REFERENCES time_period(time_period_id)
);

CREATE TABLE rainfall_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    region_id INT NOT NULL,
    period_id INT NOT NULL,
    rainfall_amount FLOAT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (region_id) REFERENCES region(region_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (period_id) REFERENCES time_period(period_id)
);

CREATE TABLE average_rainfall (
    average_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    region_id INT NOT NULL,
    period_id INT NOT NULL,
    average_rainfall FLOAT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (region_id) REFERENCES region(region_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (period_id) REFERENCES time_period(period_id)
);
